updateRules.expression: 10 + self.pf_acArmorBonus + self.pf_acShieldBonus + min(self.pf_dexMod, self.pf_acMaxDexMod) + self.pf_acSizeMod + self.pf_acNaturalArmor + self.pf_acDeflectionMod + self.pf_acMiscMod
10 + self.pf_acArmorBonus + self.pf_acShieldBonus + min(self.pf_dexMod, 0) + self.pf_acSizeMod + self.pf_acNaturalArmor + self.pf_acMiscMod
